tool_description: We provide live data on main football competitions around the world. If you're looking for soccer results, fast live-scores and statistics which can be easily integrated into your project — you're in right place.
name: Live football score
title: Live football score

api_list.name: /teams/{teamid}
/players/{playerid}
/tournaments/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://11bits-football-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com/tournaments/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "11bits-football-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
